abstract.t: This document describes proposed conventions for use on IETF-related mailing lists. Subject to normal processes and procedures, this draft might some day be published as an RFC with status of Best Current Practice (BCP). This document supplements both [RFC-2418] and [RFC-3005]. Comments on this draft may be sent directly to the editor or to the <ietf-process@lists.elistx.com> mailing list. To subscribe to that list, send an email request to ietf-process- request@lists.elistx.com
